trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with DocuSign | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with DocuSign | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Azure Active Directory and DocuSign.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Azure Active Directory and DocuSign.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with DocuSign
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with DocuSign

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and DocuSign.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and DocuSign.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A tenant in DocuSign
trans-unit.target: A tenant in DocuSign

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for DocuSign
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for DocuSign

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring account provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring account provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for DocuSign
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for DocuSign

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for DocuSign.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for DocuSign.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for DocuSign, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for DocuSign, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][1]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][1]

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][2]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][2]

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][3]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][3]

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][4]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][4]

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type **Docusign**.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type **Docusign**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][5]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][5]

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Docusign**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Docusign**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][6]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][6]

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Docusign with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Docusign with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Docusign application integration** page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Docusign application integration** page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][7]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][7]

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Docusign** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Docusign** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][8]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][8]

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Docusign sign on URL** textbox, type the URL of your Docusign tenant, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Docusign sign on URL** textbox, type the URL of your Docusign tenant, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: The URL has the following schema: *https://<yourcompanyname>.docusign.net/Member/MemberLogin.aspx?ssoname=<yourSSOInstanceName>*
trans-unit.target: The URL has the following schema: *https://<yourcompanyname>.docusign.net/Member/MemberLogin.aspx?ssoname=<yourSSOInstanceName>*

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][9]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][9]

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] If you don’t know what your app URL for your tenant is, try contacting Docusign via SSOSetup@Docusign.com to get the SP Initiated SSO URL for your tenant.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] If you don’t know what your app URL for your tenant is, try contacting Docusign via SSOSetup@Docusign.com to get the SP Initiated SSO URL for your tenant.

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Docusign** page, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Docusign** page, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][10]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][10]

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your **Docusign** company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your **Docusign** company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, expand the user’s menu, click **Preferences**, and then, in the navigation pane on the left, expand **Account Management**, and then click **Features**.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, expand the user’s menu, click **Preferences**, and then, in the navigation pane on the left, expand **Account Management**, and then click **Features**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][11]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][11]

trans-unit.source: Click **SAML Configuration**, and then click the **SAML Configuration** link.
trans-unit.target: Click **SAML Configuration**, and then click the **SAML Configuration** link.

trans-unit.source: In the **SAML 2.0 Configuration** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **SAML 2.0 Configuration** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring single sign-on ][13]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring single sign-on ][13]

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the **single sign-on configuration confirmation**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the **single sign-on configuration confirmation**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][14]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][14]

trans-unit.source: On the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Complete**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Complete**.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][15]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][15]

trans-unit.source: Configuring account provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring account provisioning

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable user provisioning of Active Directory user accounts to DocuSign.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable user provisioning of Active Directory user accounts to DocuSign.

trans-unit.source: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the **Azure Management Portal**, on the **DocuSign application integration** page, click **Configure account provisioning** to open the Configure User Provisioning dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the **Azure Management Portal**, on the **DocuSign application integration** page, click **Configure account provisioning** to open the Configure User Provisioning dialog.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring account provisioning][30]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring account provisioning][30]

trans-unit.source: On the **Settings and admin credentials** page, to enable automatic user provisioning, provide the credentials of a DocuSign account with sufficient rights, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Settings and admin credentials** page, to enable automatic user provisioning, provide the credentials of a DocuSign account with sufficient rights, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring account provisioning][31]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring account provisioning][31]

trans-unit.source: On the **Test connection** dialog, click **Start test**, and upon a successful test, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Test connection** dialog, click **Start test**, and upon a successful test, click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuring account provisioning][32]
trans-unit.target: ![Configuring account provisioning][32]

trans-unit.source: On the **Confirmation** page, click **Complete**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Confirmation** page, click **Complete**.

trans-unit.source: Configuring account provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring account provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Docusign, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Docusign, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the **Azure AD portal**, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the **Azure AD portal**, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Docusign application integration** page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Docusign application integration** page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: ![Assigning users][40]
trans-unit.target: ![Assigning users][40]

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: You should now wait for 10 minutes and verify that the account has been synchronized to Docusign.
trans-unit.target: You should now wait for 10 minutes and verify that the account has been synchronized to Docusign.

trans-unit.source: As a first verification step, you can check the provisioning status, by clicking Dashboard in the D on the Docusign application integration page on the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: As a first verification step, you can check the provisioning status, by clicking Dashboard in the D on the Docusign application integration page on the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: A successfully completed user provisioning cycle is indicated by a related status:
trans-unit.target: A successfully completed user provisioning cycle is indicated by a related status:

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see Introduction to the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see Introduction to the Access Panel.

trans-unit.target: What is application access and single sign-on with Azure Active Directory?
